title: 108_s434
content: Idaho Panhandle National Forest Improvement Act of 2004 - Authorizes the Secretary of Agriculture to convey certain National Forest System parcels in Idaho and use the proceeds for acquisition, construction, or rehabilitation of: (1) a new ranger station in the Silver Valley portion of the Idaho Panhandle National Forest. Or (2) other facilities in such Forest, to the extent that funds exceed amounts necessary for the ranger station. Authorizes appropriations.
